title: Little: Ever Thought, “It Doesn’t Make Any Difference If I Go to the Gym Today”?
description:
To form habits, we need to focus on the “growing heap,” rather than the “one-coin” – terms that take their meaning from the “Argument of the Growing Heap.”
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
